DOC.criteria: Asymptomatic HIV1 infect male patient age 1855 year inclusive . Patients virus contain NNRTI resistant mutation determine VircoGEN virtual phenotyping essay . Patients CD4 count le 250 cells/mm3 . Patients whose HIV infection diagnose less 3 month prior screen , evidence recent seroconversion . Patients HIV viral load less 5000 copies/ml use RTPCR ( Roche Amplicor v1.5 ) .
